title: Type From Details Magazine
content:
Hi. I need to know the name of the Font used at the Details Magazine released in november 2005. below a picture of the font in question.

Thank’s a lot

Gustavo Santos

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC07206.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033823/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC07206.jpg) | 180.15 KB |

 [‹ Good Books on ins and outs of Magazine Design... Looking for suggestions](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033823/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36455 "Go to previous forum topic") [Antikva Margaret ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205033823/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16680 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gsantos

comments.content: Thanks, but I need the font used in the entire magazine, included on the front page, not the Details logo font. Does somebody knows?
